thread.title: Usain Bolt sets sights on new career in football

title: Usain Bolt sets sights on new career in football
text:
Usain Bolt sets sights on new career in football 10:09am GMT - 00:35 
Retired Olympic gold medalist and world record holder waiting to see how he performs in trial with German club Borussia Dortmund before being able to decide on a career in football. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Retired Olympic gold medalist and world record holder waiting to see how he performs in trial with German club Borussia Dortmund before being able to decide on a career in football.
